name: Skip (sundhar)
description:
hi.......... welcome to the skip
here you need to travel to the star..
by using the energy of it ,you can able to rotate one full rotation.
within a complete rotation you need to tap the screen towards the right direction. else it will destroy you
if you touch the black walls you will be destroyed
the red color in the arrow indicates that rotation is going to end soon..
its your turn ...tap when the arrow is in the right direction
